page.title: 03Leisure Activities-Tuffley.
page.content: The Beaufort/Tuffley Complex is one of the features of the area enjoyed by the local residents. It is cited as one of the attractions of Tuffley. The Sports Centre attracts 6500 people each year, from babies to the over 65's. Most live locally. Others come from as far afield as Stroud and Cheltenham. The most popular sport is badminton. At the Evening Centre Yoga and Coastal Navigation prove very popular. P.E. and Swimming classes for the mentally handicapped are well supported. The Community has a membership of 1000. Attendance at their meetings varies between 30 and 150. Its Gardening Club holds an Annual Flower Show and Fete. This event is locally famous and very popular.
